Class Historian

java.lang.Object
Historian
public class Historian extends Object
Historian.java This class is responsible for maintaining the history of turns in the game. It stores the turns in an array and provides methods to push, pop, and peek at turns. It also maintains a hash of the history for quick access. The history is used to track the state of the game and to provide undo functionality.
